Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Animation::AnimationType
 

The type of an animated bitmap describes in which order the bitmaps are displayed.

Example: An animated bitmap contains the bitmaps 0, 1 and 2.
CYCLE - 0, 1, 2, 0, 1, 2, ...
OSCILLATE - 0, 1, 2, 1, 0, 1, 2, 1, 0, ...
ONCE - 0, 1, 2.

Enumerator:
Cycle 
Oscillate 
Once
